caption.p: Multivariate analysis using data from the chemical composition of essential oils obtained from fresh and dried Lippia thymoides leaves. ( A) Principal component analysis (PCA); MonHyd: Monoterpene hydrocarbons; OxygSesq: Oxygenated sesquiterpene; OxygMon: Oxygenated monoterpenes; SesqHyd: Sesquiterpene hydrocarbons. ( B) Hierarchical cluster analysis (HCA). The dashed green lines indicate the identified groupings.
